Posts.Content: May 29, 2013 06:04PM vickigar wrote: I had my biopsy yesterday and they said I will get the results tomorrow most likely.  I had the two mammos, the second one being the more magnified view and then the biopsy due to new microcalcifications showing up this year.  It was more painful and they hit a blood vessel and had lots of bleeding they had to squeeze out.  The ice did help, but I just kept asking for more pain meds during the procedure.  It was not a pleasant experience, but of course, necessary.  Talked to the nurse today, as a follow up.  I completely understand your anxiousness, as I even had a cold sore break out on my lip from the stress of worrying.  I feel frozen in being able to progress to do anything these past few days, the waiting stinks.  I jump every time the phone rings.
Posts.Title: Had biopsy today... Trisha45 ArizonaGirl1972
